item.title: Is Feedback really necessary in Person's Life?
item.description: Is feedback really necessary? Do people really care about the given feedback? Do people really care to give feedback? It all depends on the situation and people, whether to give or take the given feedback. And honestly everyone has their own views to consider or not to consider the feedback. Every individual might have come across many people giving/taking the feedb
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
